original_title: La mujer como imagen, el hombre como portador de la mirada
overview: Faces, bodies and actions are juxtaposed endlessly. Fragmented pieces of the woman come together and form the volume of what has been her image in the history of cinema; one marked by the domination and exploitation of her body. A short film homage to Laura Mulvey and her contributions to feminist film theory.
title: Woman as image, man as bearer of the look
